content.title: What is a home care team?
paragraphs: Home care is often provided by a team of health care providers. Each health care provider has unique skills, knowledge, roles, and responsibilities, working together to provide comprehensive care.

content.title: Potential benefits of home care teams:
tips: Care can be received for different needs
Complex patients have their needs addressed by various providers with special training
A larger care team can offer comprehensive support (physical, mental, emotional) for the person receiving care
